Question
========
  
In twoway ANOVA, the partial sums of squares of the effects in the ANOVA table do not always add up to the regression sum of squares (TSS-SSE) of the analysis based on regression with dummies. This happens when the factors... 
Answerlist
----------
* ...are not normally distributed.
* ...are correlated.
* ...are not centered.
* ...interact.

Solution
========

Answerlist

* Incorrect
* Correct

* Incorrect
